title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 May 2013 - XWiki
content:
<sburjan> has quit  
01:39 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
02:11 <marclijour> has joined #xwiki  
02:11 <marclijour> is there a way to disable URL/link generation in PDF export?  
02:51 <marclijour> for the record http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Configuration#HOverridethexhtml2fo.xslrules  
02:51 <marclijour> has quit  
04:30 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
05:19 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
05:21 <SvenDowideit> has joined #xwiki  
05:51 <Denis1> has quit  
08:21 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:27 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
08:29 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:30 <vmassol> has quit  
09:04 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:09 <vmassol> good morning  
09:32 <tdelafosse> has joined #xwiki  
09:37 <bouquetf> has joined #xwiki  
10:57 <cjd> has quit  
10:58 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
10:59 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:04 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
11:09 <tdelafosse> has quit  
11:18 <tdelafosse> has joined #xwiki  
12:04 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
13:09 <SvenDowideit> has quit  
13:30 <vmassol> tdelafosse: hi  
13:31 <vmassol> seems that we have an escaping test failing which might be related to your change re password change  
13:31 <vmassol> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-escaping/2459/  
13:32 <vmassol> do you think you could have a look?  
13:35 <tdelafosse> vmassol : Yes sure, I will investigate this  
13:35 <vmassol> thanks  
13:38 <vmassol> seems we have some HTTP 400 error on http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-webstandards/2443/ too, going to run locally webstandards to check it  
13:39 <tdelafosse> It is due to the fact that there don't seem to be any user corresponding to the docName passed as argument  
13:39 <tdelafosse> And in this case a HTTP 400 error is thrown  
13:40 <vmassol> if that's normal then the test need to be modified with a proper comment  
13:40 <tdelafosse> (it was how it worked before with passwd.vm, so I kept this behaviour)  
13:40 <vmassol> wait  
13:40 <vmassol> the test was passing before  
13:40 <vmassol> so if you kept the behavior it should still pass  
13:40 <vmassol> right?  
13:42 <tdelafosse> I'm not sure. What changed is that before you called xpage=passwd from a WikiUser page (and if it was not the case, it triggered the 400 error), but now ChangePassword is a page in itself  
13:42 <tdelafosse> Perhaps that's why. What are exactly these tests who failed supposed to do ?  
13:43 <vmassol> you can check the pom.xml in xwiki-enterprise-test  
13:44 <vmassol> there are several configuration sections  
13:44 <vmassol> (btw all stuff related to escaping should be moved to the escapeing test pom.xml but that's another matter)  
13:51 <tdelafosse> I found that in the pom.xml for the escaping tests : "templates/passwd\.vm <!-- must be tested on a user document, otherwise returns status 400 -->"  
13:51 <tdelafosse> So that's why it passed before I guess  
13:52 <vmassol> there's a new vm now?  
13:52 <vmassol> passwd.vm?  
13:52 <vmassol> scratch that  
13:52 <vmassol> that's the existing one  
13:53 <vmassol> you mentioned a page  
13:53 <vmassol> so it means we cannot change the password in an empty wiki?  
13:53 <vmassol> I still see passwd.vm  
13:54 <vmassol> (as you can see I have no precise idea about what you've done :))  
13:54 <vmassol> is it somewhere in the release notes?  
13:54 <vmassol> (so that I can check)  
13:54 <vmassol> can't find it on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotesXWiki51M1  
13:55 <vmassol> hmm I see http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-6882 is still open  
13:56 <tdelafosse> No I didn't changed the old passwd.vm but I redirect the change of passwords to a new page ChangePassword  
13:56 <vmassol> and indeed I commented on the issue already about the missing doc  
13:56 <tdelafosse> (I made it that way because I wanted to use groovy at the beginning)  
13:56 <tdelafosse> In fact XWiki-6882 is not finished yet : there is still the cache issue  
13:57 <vmassol> yes but since the commit has been done and quite some time ago  
13:57 <vmassol> you should have split into several issues  
13:57 <vmassol> and closed what's been done  
13:57 <vmassol> and documented it  
13:57 <vmassol> could you point me where you direct to changepassword instead of passwd.vm?  
13:57 <tdelafosse> The new page is XWiki.ChangePassword  
13:58 <vmassol> actually I see that you have a specific issue for this but it was closed as dup which is not nice IMO it should be the other way artound :)  
13:58 <vmassol> yes I know that  
13:58 <vmassol> but where is it used?  
13:59 <vmassol> found it  
13:59 <tdelafosse> XWiki.XWikiUserPreferencesSheet  
13:59 <vmassol> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/ac4f77e25e1e199978c440a394bd63c110ae81f4/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-user/xwiki-platform-user-ui/src/main/resources/XWiki/XWikiUserPreferencesSheet.xml#L88  
14:00 <vmassol> so if I understand correctly:  
14:00 <vmassol> - in an empty wiki passwd.vm is still used  
14:00 <vmassol> - in a wiki with the admin app the new ChangePassword page is used  
14:00 <vmassol> is that it?  
14:01 <vmassol> testing  
14:01 <tdelafosse> Yes should be  
14:01 <vmassol> I'd like to understand when passwd.vm is used now  
14:02 <tdelafosse> The way I saw it was that passwd.vm was not supposed to be used anymore  
14:02 <tdelafosse> But I didn't consider the empty wiki case  
14:02 <vmassol> ok just tested and there's no UI link to passwd.vm to change the password  
14:02 <vmassol> wdym?  
14:02 <vmassol> (wdym by "was not supposed to be used anymore)  
14:03 <tdelafosse> I mean that to my mind, normally all users would change their passwords through ChangePassword  
14:04 <vmassol> ChangePassword isn't new?  
14:04 <vmassol> "but I redirect the change of passwords to a new page ChangePassword"  
14:04 <vmassol> to me this means you added it, no?  
14:04 <tdelafosse> Yes  
14:04 <vmassol> so why did you say "was not supposed to be used anymore"  
14:04 <vmassol> ?  
14:04 <vmassol> what was the other option before your change?  
14:05 <tdelafosse> There was no other option that passwd.vm  
14:05 <vmassol> ah ok so you forgot to handle passwd.vm  
14:05 <vmassol> it's a pretty important change  
14:05 <vmassol> since before we were able to change passwords without the admin app but now it's not possible  
14:05 <vmassol> so we need to decide if that's ok  
14:05 <tdelafosse> I let passwd.vm be because of backward compatibility concern  
14:06 <vmassol> bt I don't see any doc in it about that!!!!  
14:06 <vmassol> where is this documented?  
14:06 <vmassol> (except in your head :))  
14:06 <vmassol> how am I supposed to know?  
14:07 <vmassol> it's not a minor change, it's prtty serious  
14:07 <vmassol> it's very serious actually because people used to override passwd.vm  
14:07 <vmassol> and now all their apps will be broken  
14:07 <vmassol> s/apps/customizations/  
14:07 <vmassol> becauise passwd.vm won't be called anymore  
14:07 <tdelafosse> I was thinking I should document it when closing the whole issue... Sorry about that  
14:08 <vmassol> I think it would have required some proposal (maybe you sent it but I missed it?)  
14:08 <tdelafosse> Actually now that I don't need groovy, I think I can use passwd.vm to do the same thing.  
14:08 <vmassol> removing a vm file usage is pretty serious  
14:08 <sdumitriu> has left #xwiki  
14:09 <tdelafosse> I didn't made a proposal. I stressed it in my PR but had no return about that  
14:09 <tdelafosse> So I thougth it was OK  
14:09 <vmassol> well I guess only sergiu looked at the PR (but not very closely)  
14:09 <vmassol> (not your fault)  
14:11 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
14:27 <tmortagne> I'm currently upgrading myxwiki.org btw  
14:29 <vmassol> ok  
14:33 <vmassol> reproduce the webstandrards issues on the 3 failin gtests  
14:33 <vmassol> \*reproduced  
14:33 <vmassol> tdelafosse: I'm pretty sure it's the same problem as for the escaping tests  
14:34 <vmassol> so they'll get fixed automatically when you move your changes to passwd.vm and remove ChangePassword.xml  
14:34 <tmortagne> has quit  
14:38 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
17:27 <tdelafosse> has quit  
18:01 <Denis1> has quit  
18:55 <Denis1> has joined #xwiki  
18:58 <Denis1> is now known as <Denis>  
19:06 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
19:11 <tmortagne> has quit  
19:26 <Slashman> has quit  
19:36 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
20:45 <kstuart> has quit  
20:47 <kstuart> has joined #xwiki  
21:05 <Denis> has quit  
22:39 <Dale\_> has joined #xwiki  
22:40 <Dale\_> I have a quick question about upgrading from 4.2 to 4.5.3  
22:40 <Dale\_> I'm getting the following error: The index 'ase\_requestid' is dependent on column 'ase\_requestid'  
22:40 <Dale\_> I can alter this by hand, but should I?  Will there be many more?  
23:28 <abusenius> has quit  
23:48 <vmassol> has quit
